data.description:
This watchface is a forked version of ForeCal by SeaPea Software - instead of using Yahoo Weather, this version uses the Wunderground API!  Note that FREE registration with Wunderground.com is REQUIRED to get an API key!  I would encourage you to download the amazing, original version of ForeCal unless you specifically like Wunderground as much as me!  Many thanks to SeaPea for making such a great watchface!

Features:
-Battery and bluetooth indicator
-Current conditions based on city and state updated every 20, 30, or 60 minutes
-High temp, low temp, and forecast for current day (or next day if after user-specified time)
-Calendar at bottom of watchface

Limitations:
-Requires Wunderground.com free API key
-Only supports weather in the United States, sorry :(
-No GPS support, must enter city and state

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed somewhat rare issue where weather icon did not appear

data.title: Wunder ForeCal

data.author: Tim Martin
data.description:
Higgs O'Clock simulates the decay of a new Higgs boson every minute and renders how the Higgs decay would appear in the ATLAS Detector, one of the four experiments on the Large Hadron Collider in Geneva.

In analogue mode, the Higgs decay is fixed to WW to electron, muon and two neutrinos. The muon (red line) tells the minute and the electron (green) tells the hour.

The circular boarders around the ATLAS sub-detectors will turn from thin to thick as you progress towards your daily average-activity goal.

Features:
 * Digital mode, new Higgs decay every minute.
 * Analogue mode, tells the time with particles.
 * Optional Higgs decay information.
 * Optional calendar.
 * Optional weather, with on-watch caching.
 * Optional battery display.
 * Optional Bluetooth disconnect alert.
 * Optional activity display.

Credits:
Higgs to photon photon candidate event display, ATLAS Experiment © 2014 CERN
More on the ATLAS Detector: http://atlas.cern/
https://github.com/pebble-hacks/gpath-bezier
https://github.com/pebble/slate
data.title: Higgs O'clock

data.description:
This watchface is simply beautiful. You can choose between 12h and 24h clock in the pebble settings.

While one hour pass, the red panel which shows the time, slides from the top (when the hour began) to the bottom (when the our is nearly over).

QuickView is supported and Vibrate-on-disconnect added :)

ATTENTION: It's not pink like in the screenshots, it's red!


Imagine you hava a deadline until 4pm, so you are in hurry because you have not much time left. The watch should now just quickly show the time left, but reading the time may distract you shortly. To prevent this and provide fast the time, you can see the panel (and its distance to the bottom) and guess roughly what time time it is. This is faster, and when when it reaches 4pm, the panel stays on the top af the screen.

Do you like this? Give me a ♥

This watchface works on all pebble smartwatches.
Do you want to customize it yourself? See my github.
data.title: LIFT

Super clean, super legible watch face for pebble classic, time and time round. This watch face is all about clarity.

Highlights include:
* Black and white design to ensure maximum readability, even in low light situations.
* Time is displayed within large white blocks to ensure clarity even at a glance.
* Time of day (AM/PM), day of week as well as full date is also displayed.
* Status indicators for Bluetooth, power remaining, and charging.

data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Fix for display on Pebble Time Round when returning from notification.

data.description:
Digital watchface on the surface of a sphere with some of the curved lines broken to form four digits, each comprised of 5 rows of 3 dashes.   These are hours (top) and minutes (bottom).
  
Displays in 12 or 24 hour format, depending on watch settings.  In 12-hour format, AM marker is bottom left (blank section), PM top right.
  
Optional battery level is displayed vertically at center of the sphere with remaining level being lit. 
  
Configuration options: background / foreground colors and whether to show battery level. 
  
The display is cryptic, yet easy to read when you know where to look.
  
Screenshots show:
(1) 12:59PM no battery level
(2) 06:24AM 90% battery
(3) 17:38 100% battery (24-hour)
(4) 03:25 30% battery (24-hour)
  
This design was created by Heather Sable Villano and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio. It is published with the designers’ permission. 
  
The original design can be found here: http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/11/22/sphere-led-watch-creates-3d-illusion/

latest_release.release_notes: Fix for display on Pebble Time Round when returning from notification.

data.title: Sphere

changelog.release_notes: Fixed step count position too high when timeline peek is showing.

Fixed bug where step count can't be saved as black
Added sleep duration that shows for 30 minutes when you wake up.
Restored the old look for the rounded numbers
Made the numbers look better on the round.

data.description:
Special thanks to Pat Reilly for the design.

You can change the color of every part of the watch in the settings page.

The second hand is hidden by default to maximize battery life, but you can turn it on in apple settings.

When battery is under 30% a low battery icon appears on the top right.

Your current step count (stats pulled from the Pebble Health app) can be displayed, but is hidden by default. The AHA recommends taking at least 10,000 steps per day.

If displaying your step count is enabled, your step count will be replaced by your sleep duration and displayed for 30 minutes when you wake up, as detected by Pebble Health. Detection is delayed by 5 minutes.

Other optional settings:

Hourly vibrate with per hour pattern.
Show/Hide date and week.
Increase date size.
Icon and vibrate on bluetooth lost.
Quiet time icon.
Turn on backlight with casual arm gesture (by Matt Hungerford).

Donations welcome: http://www.paypal.me/terryyuen/1usd

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed step count position too high when timeline peek is showing.

data.description:
ÂM LỊCH VIỆT NAM - mặt đồng hồ cho người Việt Nam.

Lưu ý: cần đăng kí để được sử dụng watchface này. Đăng kí tại: facebook.com/vnpebble

Hãy nhấn ❤ để nói rằng bạn hài lòng với watchface này.
 
 Các chức năng:
 - Hiển thị tiếng Việt đầy đủ mà không cần cài thêm font
 - Hiển thị ngày tháng dương lịch
 - Hiển thị trạng thái kết nối Bluetooth
 - Hiển thị trạng thái Pin với 5 loại: Yếu, T. Bình, Cao, Sạc đầy và Đang sạc.
 - Hiển ngày trong tuần (Chủ nhật, Thứ hai,... Thứ bảy)
 - Hiển tiết khí của ngày hiện tại (24 tiết khí)
 - Hiển thị chi tiết tháng âm lịch, bao gồm tháng nhuận (*), tháng đủ hay thiếu
 - Hiển thị ngày âm lịch
 - Hiển thị năm âm lịch theo Can - Chi
 - Hiển thị thời tiết và nhiệt độ hiện tại (cập nhật mỗi 15 phút)
 - Hiển thị số bước đi và quãng đường đã đi

Lưu ý: Âm lịch được tính sẵn cho 134 năm kể từ ngày 1/1/2010, do đó bạn không cần kết nối internet vẫn có thể xem được âm lịch hằng ngày, nếu bạn chỉnh giờ trước năm 2010 hoặc sau năm 2144 thì ngày tháng năm âm lịch sẽ không chính xác.

* Liên hệ: vnpebble@gmail.com

latest_release.release_notes: Sửa lỗi tháng tính sai tháng âm lịch

data.title: Âm lịch Việt Nam

data.author: dangerouswoo
data.description:
日本専用。
潮汐　近い地域の観測地点の潮汐(潮の満ち引き)を表示します。
縦軸の中心が平均海面で50cm区切りです。
横軸の中心が現在時間で、1時間区切りです。
Z0は、地域の平均海面(cm)です。

天候、月齢、現在住所、現在緯度経度、Yahoo天候災害情報を表示します。

潮汐、天候は、母艦であるスマートホンの位置情報とネット接続を必要とします。

参考サイト:http://koyomi8.com/tide.htm

Japan only.
It displays the tide of the observation point of the tide near the region.
Weather, to display the age.

- added platform support for pebble 2

V1.5:
- fixed jumping watch hands at first timer tick
- fixed vibration max time configuration
- cleaned configuration page code

V1.4:
- added Bluetooth indicator (optional in ambient mode)
- added vibration every 15 minures (optional, with silent time range)

V1.3:
- added battery display (permanent or in active mode only)

V1.2:
- Made watchface configurable:
  You can now select the delay before ElegantAnalog switches to battery saving ambient mode as well as if you like minute ticks in ambient mode.

V1.1:
- Show 12/24h according to watch settings (thanks to Thomas E. for pointing out!)

data.description:
An elegant analog watchface.
Shows additional information (seconds, date, battery, bluetooth, ...) on tap event for 10 seconds (configurable), then reduces elements to increase battery life.
Many configuration settings available.

latest_release.release_notes:
V1.6:
- fixed configuration not being shown anymore
- added platform support for pebble 2

data.author: Kiezel
data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

If you love our faces, give us a heart. Thank you!

Arc is built to give your Pebble Time Round a modern and minimal look. Not only does it tell the time but it also shows the status of your step count goal. The middle arc shows your progress of your goal that you set in the settings. Full circle means you’ve met your goal. Also turn on the shake feature to see in detail how many steps you’ve walked for the day.

And as always with Kiezel faces, color presets and the ability to customize all the colors to your liking.

Enjoy!

Team Kiezel-
data.title: Arc

data.author: SFWsoft

changelog.release_notes: Fixed a problem where the Weather would not update.

•	Fine-tuning of weather icon background updating.
•	Added weather data caching after watch-face re-open.
•	Preparation for additional time fonts in next release
TWEAK:  Tweaked the Background color functionality for Pebble Round

•	Added Background Color Setting (This might still be a little experimental)
 •	Moved Location label down one pixel for aesthetic reasons
 •	Change font to BOLD for step count when "always show steps" is set for more visibility
 •	Added trimming to registration address in config so that spaces are automatically compensated for

BUGFIX RELEASE

- last release broke the showing of step count, when shaking - FIXED (Thx Christoph for feedback)

BATTERY OPTIMIZATION

- Removed watch logging to minimize Bluetooth comms
- Made minor changes to HA & weather refreshing
- Added HA Status text to API

WEATHER RELEASE

Manual city for weather in city.  This will also be used for sunrise/sunset calculations.  See Openweathermap.org for city list

SERVICE RELEASE:

Fixed clipping issue for bottom bar text, by tweaking positions. Thx for the feedback Christ Wilshaw.

•	Initial state of Bluetooth Icon, was “connected”, now accurate.
•	Problem with Original Pebble/Pebble steel devices & background disappearing on changing of settings, fixed.
•	Configuration was still showing color options for non-color devices.  Hidden now as intended.
•	Weather was not updating in certain instances when another message was being sent/received.  Now more robust.
•	Better handling of connected/disconnected states during update cycles
•	Enhanced icon dithering options when changing colors.
FIX - 1.50 was pointing to BETA config url

COLOR CUSTOMISATION RELEASE! 
 •         Customise Colors.
•	You can now customize the color of most of the elements on the watchface from the configuration screen.
•	This includes graphical elements like icons and background.
 •         Theme Selection.
•	You can choose from three options (Mellow Dots, Liner Laser & Calligraphy).  They are not exactly artistic, but I’ll work on them.
 •         Introduced Trial mode.
•	Putting “trial” in the Key box on the configuration page will give you a 7 day fully functional watchface to see all the features.

WEATHER FORECAST RELEASE! 

•	Completed 3 Day forecast.  On Pebble round this is only TWO days due to space restrictions.
o	Instead of including additonal resources (that take more memory), I spent time writing code that will resize the images I have already. This keeps memory usage and app size down, but it took longer to complete.

MAINTENANCE RELEASE! 
•           Optimized bottom bar text to better suit Pebble Round. Thx Mattias for feedback.
•           Migrated configuration to another host that supports SSL for secure transactions (API).  Yes... you will loose your settings :(

MAJOR RELEASE! 

•       Added Registration
	Purchase a Key. Simply enter your email address, and your own Key (can be anything).
	Will unlock additional options for Bottom Bar.
	Will allow you to use the HA API

•       Added Bottom Bar mode options
	High level of customization now possible.
	See http://sfwsoft.co.za/yawn.html for options and explanation

•       Implemented Beta of HA Api.  See http://sfwsoft.co.za/yawn.html for more infromation
	This is still quite basic.  It relies on polling, but will soon be push oriented after ome rigorous testing.

COSMETICS RELEASE! 

•	Changed battery Icon steps to be 3/6 bars on 50%.  Added shaded bars for inbetween percentages (Time & Round only)
•	Tweaked alignment of step text.... it was off by a pixel or two an bothered me.
•	Added "LOCATION ERROR" as city (above time) when Location cannot be established by phone.

FIXES RELEASE! 

•	Added Enable/Disable Health on configuration page.  If you have health disabled on the pebble, it gives an annoing message every time the watchface opens. Disabling it here will stop that. Thx Joe for this one.

ENHANCEMENTS RELEASE! 

•	Reshuffled configuration page
•	Moved config to final hosting site. YOU WILL UNFORTUNATELY LOOSE YOUR SAVED SETTINGS.
•	Added Vibe on Connection Status change to configuration
•	Added Weather update Frequency to configuration 
•	Added “Always Show Step count” to configuration
•	Added first steps to Automation API (email and password)

CONFIGURATION RELEASE!

* Added Configuration Page
* Show/Hide Bluetooth Icon
* Show/Hide Battery Icon
* Battery Icon Mode - Icon/Percentage/Both
* Temperature Mode - C/F
* Option to hide automation icons until I complete the functionality
Initial release for brave or bored folks

data.description:
Yet-Another-Watchface-Noob.

Features:
* Bluetooth Status
* Battery Status
* Weather (graphic, current temp, forecast min/max)
* Shake for step count
* Date
* Customizable Bottom bar (MANY options)
* Full color customization

I made this watchface for my own needs.  It's a fully functional (albeit limited) watchface that includes weather and normal Battery and Bluetooth status.  I am working towards making the bottom bar customizable.  My personal need is for it to show statuses for various parts of my home automation system.
It can already show many different options including:
2nd timezone, sunrise/sunset, custom text, 3 day forecast and of course the home automation icons.
All the colors are customizable.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a problem where the Weather would not update.

data.title: YAWN

data.author: sairyo
data.description:
Features:
 * Bluetooth Status
 * Battery Status
 * Weather
 * Date
 * Auto RPG

■概要
時間とともに勝手に冒険するRPG風の時計です。

■コンセプト
必要最低限の機能と、時計を見た時に何か変化が欲しいと思ったのがきっかけ。
エンディングもなく、ひたすら強く、ひたすら先に進んでいきます。

■機能
・日本語
・日付/時刻/充電量/BlueToothONOFF/温度と天気(1時間に1度更新)を表示
・画像を使っていない、母艦との通信も1時間に1度なので電池消費は少ない。
・中央の画面では1分に1回自動でプレイヤーがダンジョンを進み次第に強くなっていきます。
・マモノに負けるとレベルを引き継いで最初からスタートします。
・時計を振るとステータス画面が表示されます。
data.title: RPG WATCH

data.author: Hugo Arends
data.description:
Tutela is a beautiful and elegant watchface with lots of customization options.
Perhaps the most interesting feature is the fact that the hour and minutes hand will never be in front of the date: the date moves every 15 minutes to a free display position.
Another nice feature is the color of the seconds hand. This elegantly shows the battery level.

Options:
- Several color themes
- Several date formats
- Optional vibrate on Bluetooth connectivity changes
- Optional visual indicator when Bluetooth is disconnected
data.title: Tutela

data.author: schniedel_castro
data.description:
Watchface displays the time in a rude kind of way.
In addition AM/PM, date, temperature, weather icon, BlueTooth Connectivity, battery state and location or steps/average steps are displayed, too.

It's also possible to define a goal for your daily steps. If you enable it in the configuration page, the watchface will display your progress to achieve your goal.
The bar's color will indicate the different steps of achieving your goal.
 - Red: You are below your average
 - Yellow: You are above your average
 - Green: You have achieved your goal

The small white line shows your average steps in reference to your goal.

The weather information is taken from http://openweathermap.org/. It will be updated every 30 minutes.

Changelog:
v1.6: spelling error corrected 
v1.5: Added some icons and a progress bar for daily steps
v1.4: Solved BT icon issue
v1.3: problem with configuration is fixes, configuration will not be resetted anymore when watchface is reloaded 
v1.2: now able to display daily steps rather than location via configuration page 
v1.1: configuration page added, temperature format is  customizable now (choose between °C and °F)
data.title: My watch doesn't like me!

Updated, cleaner logo.
Bluetooth disconnected text replaced with image.

* Display time, updating once per minute- using system font
  * Display Battery power
  * Display notice when Bluetooth is disconnected
  * Have a config/settings option on Phone to configure:
      * Foreground (time/date/etc. text) color
      * Background color
      * Whether to vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect (default is do not vibrate)
